conclusion: Determine the gravitational force exerted by the remaining part of the sphere on the point mass m using superposition and gravitational force formula.
Calculate the gravitational force F_original due to the original sphere on the point mass m: F_original = GMm/(4R^2).
Determine the mass of the removed sphere: M_removed = (1/8)M.
Calculate the gravitational force F_removed due to the removed sphere on the point mass m: F_removed = GMm/(64R^2).
Determine the gravitational force due to the remaining part: F_remaining = F_original - F_removed = 15GMm/(64R^2).
